item.title: EverSiege: Untold Ages launches in Early Access this fall
item.content:encoded:
• PC

New playtest available today.

Roguelite action strategy game EverSiege: Untold Ages will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam this fall, publisher Dear Villagers and developer Tindalos Interactive announced.

The announcement comes following several playtests with “thousands” of participants held over the last few months. A new session opened today and will run until August 25. Players can request access via the game’s Steam page and share feedback and suggestions with the development team via Discord.

“Players’ feedback already plays a crucial role in shaping EverSiege: Untold Ages,” said creative director Romain Clavier in a press release. ”This is our most ambitious project yet, and to bring it to life in the best possible way, we need their input early in development. Gathering players’ feedback will allow us to fine-tune systems and upcoming features while there’s still time to make meaningful changes.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Dear Villagers:

About

Two centuries after the world fell, Bastion still stands.

Once banished by the ancient gods, you are summoned to break the EVERSIEGE.

Each run forces hard choices—what to rebuild, what to spare, which power to pursue.

Wield legendary weapons, pair them with elemental Essences, and craft your playstyle through evolving challenges. Rebuild Bastion, manage your resources, and hold the line against relentless hordes while striking deep into enemy territory.

Defend Bastion. Break the everSiege.

Key Features

  • Defend, Rebuild, and Reclaim
    • Bastion is your last stronghold, and every decision counts.
    • Gather resources, reinforce your defenses, and make tactical calls in real time as hordes tighten their grip.
    • Will you invest in towers, push the front lines, or unlock ancient shrines? Bastion is more than a refuge, it’s a weapon. Survive the siege, reclaim the land, and face the Evil master behind it all.
  • Combine Wargears and Essences
    • Shape your playstyle by combining weapons and elemental Essences.
    • Whether you wield swift daggers, a crushing axe, or a precise longbow, each Wargear unlocks a unique approach to combat. Pair it with fire, ice, lightning… Essence to craft your build.
    • Mix, match, and experiment—every synergy unlocks new tactics, and the possibilities are almost endless.
  • Each Run is a New Adventure
    • You might hold your victory now, but the evil is rooting far back. Backtrack through time to defeat all versions of the Evil Master.
    • But the corridors of time are unpredictable, as every leap back reveals an altered and more dangerous version of reality.
    • Survive, upgrade, and adapt. Your choices shape every run, unlocking lasting power through evolving challenges and ever-changing battlegrounds.

Watch a new trailer below.

Gamescom 2025 Trailer

item.title: Deer & Boy launches in 2026 for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Cinematic platformer gets a release window and publisher.

Cinematic platformer Deer & Boy will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2026, newly revealed publisher Dear Villagers and developer Lifeline Game Studio announced.

“To everyone who’s shown love for Deer & Boy, thank you from the bottom of my heart,” said Lifeline Game Studio founder and game director Jayson Houdet in a press release. “It means the world to see so many of you touched by the little glimpse we’ve shared. We feel the weight of your expectations, and we’re pouring everything we have into bringing our vision to life, and sharing something truly meaningful with you.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Dear Villagers:

First revealed during the 2024 Summer Games Fest, Deer & Boy is a touching story about a boy fleeing from his home. Upon getting lost, he stumbles on a frightened fawn, and they both quickly realize how much they need each other to face the struggles of their lives and how their unexpected yet poetic friendship will take them further than they ever hoped.

As they travel together to escape their realities, the fawn will mature into a vigorous deer, which, in turn, will help the boy face the obstacles of his fate and emerge from this dreamlike voyage a grown-up.

As the first project of Lifeline Game Studio, a young studio founded by veteran developer Jayson Houdet, Deer & Boy aims to deliver an emotional journey that can only be conveyed by pairing the emotional visuals of animation with a poignant connection to characters and story of video games.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Edge of Memories delayed to 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

New gameplay trailer released.

Publisher Nacon and developer Midgar Studio have delayed action RPG Edge of Memories from its previously planned fall 2025 release window to 2026. It will be available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nacon:

About

The Corrosion, a plague of unparalleled proportions, has already ravaged the Astryan continent. On the other side of the world, the continent of Avaris and its nomadic peoples—so far spared from the horrors spawned by this abomination—now stand on the brink of extinction. Eline, an itinerant Soul Whisperer, relentlessly battles the force that turns the once-thriving fauna, flora and humans of this lush land into grotesque abominations. Following a mysterious encounter, a dark power awakens within her, one that may hold the key to ending this apocalypse: the ability to control the Corrosion within her own body.

But saving a world already doomed is no easy task. With the help of Ysoris, her unlikely mentor, and Kanta, shaman prince of a lost tribe, Eline must overcome the formidable adversaries standing in her way.

Intense Real-Time Combat

Engage in fierce battles against relentless enemies alongside your allies, and unleash your devastating powers to wipe them out!

  • String together spectacular combos by alternating between rapid strikes and devastating techniques to dominate your opponents.
  • Your allies are the key to victory. Customize your companions, and use their skills wisely to inflict more damage at crucial moments.
  • Let rage consume you and transform into a Berserker to deliver earth-shattering blows, which turn into a series of merciless executions.

A Stunning and Corrupted World

Avaris, a land of many faces, is as scarred as the rest of Heryon. From the idyllic sandy shores of the port city of Sarlah-Durah to the snow-capped peaks of the Kezal Mountains, every landscape bears the marks of the Corrosion’s abominations.

  • Explore the Continent of Avaris in the Grip of the Corrosion – Discover rich environments with vibrant colors, and observe the scourge ravaging these enchanting landscapes. As you progress through the story, the game transforms places you have previously travelled through and creates strange new paths to take.
  • Ride a Nekaroo – Traverse the vast lands of Avaris atop this loyal feline companion and take advantage of its agility to access unreachable areas.
  • Enjoy Stunning Visuals Inspired by Japanese Animation – Discover or rediscover the breathtaking world of Heryon through Avaris, a colorful and radiant continent brought to life with Unreal Engine 5.

An Intense Story With No Dull Moments

  • A Gripping Epic With No Fillers – Experience an original narrative where every quest matters, adding new depth to the story, the characters or their relationships.
  • Dive Into an Emotional Journey – Travel across a continent inhabited by nomadic civilizations forced to migrate to escape the Corrosion, and connect with those who have chosen to await death while celebrating life.

A Poetic Soundtrack

Whether you are exploring the vast expanses of the continent of Avaris or battling relentless Corroded foes, enjoy a dynamic and adaptive soundtrack composed by Cedric Menendez. Carried by the enchanting voice of Emi Evans, known for her work on NieR: Automata, your journey culminates with a final theme composed by Yasunori Mitsuda, famed for his work on games such as Chrono Trigger, Xenoblade Chronicles, and Sea of Stars.

Watch a new trailer below.

Gameplay Trailer

item.title: FEROCIOUS launches this winter
item.content:encoded:
• PC

New gameplay trailer released.

Dinosaur first-person shooter FEROCIOUS will launch for PC via Steam this winter, publisher tinyBuild and developer OMYOG announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Immerse yourself in a survival first-person shooter adventure. Stranded on a dangerous island, face mercenaries, dinosaurs, and a vibrant yet hostile ecosystem. Explore breathtaking environments and survive the onslaught of intense, fast-paced encounters.

A Savage and Dangerous Island

Wake up on an uncharted island where the world feels alive and unpredictable. From ancient ruins to apex predators, every element of the environment shapes your fight for survival. Explore, adapt, and use the island’s dangers to your advantage. This isn’t just a setting—it’s a relentless, ever-changing force that challenges and rewards those who dare to uncover its secrets.

Intense and Adaptive First-Person Shooter Combat

Engage in relentless combat with mercenaries, dinosaurs, and mechas in a dynamic FPS adventure. Craft weapons and gear using resources from the environment to adapt to any challenge. Tailor your arsenal to suit your approach. Every fight delivers a high-stakes, unforgettable experience.

Master the Wild

Stranded on a deadly island, survival is all that matters.

Every step challenges you with savage predators, treacherous terrain, and limited resources.

Explore carefully to uncover hidden paths, secrets, and essential gear. Turn the wild to your advantage: control dinosaurs to attack enemies, open paths, or infiltrate guarded areas.

Every encounter is an opportunity—or a threat.

Watch the trailer below.

item.title: Streumon Studio announces ‘daimonic first-person slasher’ Daimon Blades for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Due out in Early Access on September 3.

Streumon Studio has announced “daimonic first-person slasher” Daimon Blades, a new game set in the universe of E.Y.E: Divine Cybermancy. It will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on September 3.

Here is an overview of the game, via Streumon Studio:

Daimon Blades is a daimonic first-person slasher where steel meets sin. Lead the scorched legions spawned from the abyssal entropy to their final reckoning alone or with a steel-clad group of four as you take up arms as a member of the Secreta, a shadowy cult of warrior monks sworn to contain the rising tide of daimonic incursions. Daimon Blades is set in the universe of Streumon’s breakout E.Y.E: Divine Cybermancy.

To survive the cursed expeditions of the Daimon Realms, players must loot, craft, and evolve their daimon-slaying champions into true hellborn executioners in this RPG-infused first-person slasher. Along the way, they’ll face a relentless and ever-mutating bestiary of twisted Daimons bred in the wombs of chaos, each wielding distinct tactics that demand constant vigilance and adaptability. Wield your weapon of destruction, be it a flame-spewing sword, a bloodstained battle axe or a hammer that pulverizes bone to dust, and carve your name into the shifting dimensions as thunderous metal anthems drive your rampage.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Dark, visceral worlds are nothing new to Streumon. After emerging from the modding scene of the early 2000s, the team launched its first commercial title, E.Y.E: Divine Cybermancy, a million-selling cyberpunk RPG shooter that quickly earned a cult following. The studio went on to spill blood across the grimdark universe of Warhammer 40,000, developing Space Hulk: Deathwing and Necromunda: Hired Gun.

Now, Streumon returns to its independent roots as developer and publisher of Daimon Blades, following a strategic move to reacquire full ownership of the studio in an era dominated by acquisitions and mergers. This renewed independence reflects the team’s deep commitment to creative control and quality. With Daimon Blades, Streumon is forging a bold new cooperative slasher, shaped by experience and driven by uncompromised vision.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Survival strategy game Star Trek Voyager: Across the Unknown announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Take the helm and command your crew.

Publisher Daedalic Entertainment and developer Gamexcite have announced survival strategy game Star Trek Voyager: Across the Unknown for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

“Star Trek Voyager: Across the Unknown is a project driven by passion—both for storytelling and for the legacy of Star Trek,” said Daedalic Entertainment chief operating officer Jonas Husges in a press release “We’re excited to bring the U.S.S. Voyager crew back into the spotlight in a way that feels true to canon while offering new narrative frontiers to explore.”

Gamexcite director Daniel Bernard added, “As lifelong fans of Star Trek, we’re thrilled to contribute to this iconic universe. This game isn’t just about nostalgia—it’s about giving players the conn and letting them chart their own course through the unknown.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Daedalic Entertainment:

About

Star Trek Voyager: Across the Unknown is a story-driven survival strategy game in which the fate of the iconic starship is in your hands. Take the helm, manage the ship and resources, and make difficult decisions. Will you be able to bring home the ship and its crew?

“What if?” Scenarios

Did you ever wonder what would have happened had Captain Janeway decided differently? If an important crew member had followed a different path? Or what the outcome would have been had the crew of the U.S.S. Voyager embraced Borg technology to increase their chances of survival?

Wonder no more: Star Trek Voyager: Across the Unknown allows players to take control and shape the journey of the U.S.S. Voyager as they want. Take a risky approach or play it safe. Be diplomatic or let phasers do the talking. Research technologies that were shunned by the crew. But: Be prepared to deal with the consequences of your actions! The game features roguelike elements, so in each run you will encounter different situations and even iconic characters might meet an early end if you don’t react accordingly.

Deep Ship Management and Research

After being moved forcefully into the Delta Quadrant, the U.S.S. Voyager ends up heavily damaged and in dire need of repairs as well as internal reconstruction. Restore destroyed rooms, secure life support and energy supplies, and start constructing. Ship systems, crew quarters, industrial and research facilities: You must decide what to build and when, to ensure the ship has what it needs for the perilous journey.

Expedite research into different fields. New technologies and improved layouts will not only strengthen the ship but also boost your crew’s morale. Exotic and dangerous research, like the technology of the Borg, is also within your reach. As captain, will you embrace it for the potential it offers, or will you omit it for the dangers it presents?

Exploration and Resource Acquisition

The dangers and opportunities of the Delta Quadrant beckon to be discovered by you and your crew. Scan celestial bodies to locate precious resources that fuel your journey. Find points of interest and oddities along your way, but beware: While the Delta Quadrant may reward the bold, it punishes the careless just as quickly. As captain, you have the final say in plotting a course and defining an approach.

Ship Combat and Away Missions

The journey of the U.S.S. Voyager would not be possible without both combat between ships and away missions to planets or space facilities.

For away missions, put together a team based on the individual talents of your crew. A team with skills that complement each other might be best suited for the task, but it is up to you to call the shots. Minimize the risk for the team’s members, rush headlong into danger, or take a scientific approach—you decide.

When diplomacy fails, the U.S.S. Voyager and its crew are ready to enter ship combat at your command. From the bridge, you give commands for offensive and defensive maneuvers, targeting enemy ship systems and using special weaponry. And even during ship combat, the individual skills of your crew members come into play: Assign battle stations to crew who bring precious skills to the table and trigger them in crucial moments to maximize your combat effectiveness.

Key Features

  • “What if?” Scenario and Storytelling – The ultimate platform to play out your course of action during the iconic journey of the U.S.S. Voyager.
  • Complex Ship Management – Repair, construct, and maintain an efficient and habitable ship to ensure systems and crew operate effectively.
  • Exploration and Decision Making – The Delta Quadrant is a fascinating yet perilous place that awaits exploration and demands decisive action.
  • Combat and Away Missions – Use the talents of your crew smartly to minimize risk during away missions as well as strike boldly during ship combat encounters.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Virtual reality survival horror game Dread Meridian announced for SteamVR, Quest 2 and 3
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Quest

A frozen wasteland of horrors to uncover.

Publisher Level Infinite and developer KUKRGAME have announced virtual reality survival horror game Dread Meridian for SteamVR, Quest 2, and Quest 3. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Level Infinite:

About

Dread Meridian is a chilling atmospheric survival horror game. Built from the ground up for virtual reality, it aims to deliver a frozen wasteland of horrors to uncover on the island of Oglanbyen.

Play as Daniella, a researcher who travels to a remote island spiraling into madness in search of her lost twin sister. In this harrowing adventure, players will come face to face with unimaginable creatures, cryptic puzzles and dread-filled environments. Battle the way you want with intense VR combat and tactical decisions. It’ll be up to players to choose how to best utilize their limited resources and customizable weapons. When ammo is low, players can pull out their trusty knife and fight till their last breath.

Key Features

  • Terrifying Monstrosities Await – Test your wits against the twisted creatures that stalk the lands. Planning is key to survival on the lost island.
  • Explore Treacherous Environments – Immerse yourself in the dread-filled Oglanbyen, where you never know what could be around the next corner.
  • Fight to Live – Scavenge ammo and supplies to survive the island’s hostile inhabitants. Customize your weapon with salvaged attachments. When all else fails, rely on your trusty knife and fight to your last breath.
  • Uncover the Secrets of Oglanbyen – Break into research facilities and abandoned mines to gather clues to the whereabouts of your lost sister.

Community testing is scheduled to take place later in 2025. Further updates are also planned in the near future, including new information on the game’s plans for a cooperative player-versus-environment mode.

item.title: Netmarble announces cozy crafting adventure game Project Bloomwalker for Xbox Series, PC, and more
item.content:encoded:
■ About

Project Bloomwalker is an all-new cozy crafting adventure game.

Bloomwalker translates to “one who walks while blooming flowers,” reflecting a vision of a world where the protagonist’s footsteps bring life back with every step. The title symbolizes the power of players to be a force of healing and renewal that transforms the world around them. Aboard their moving house, players and their adorable spirt companions called Oddling embark on a journey to explore uncharted territories, cleanse tainted landscapes, gather resources for crafting and decoration, and forge bonds with their Oddling friends as they prepare for new adventures.

Set in a once-beautiful land shared by humans and mysterious spirits, the game begins when a mysterious meteor crashes down that leaves an impact site so polluted that no life can survive. As the world suffers, Bloomwalkers appear who can wield power to restore life and heal the wounded earth. Taking on the role of a Bloomwalker, players will journey forth in their unique moving house to cleanse the polluted landscapes and rekindle the harmony of nature.

The difference between Project Bloomwalker and other crafting games is its moving house system. Instead of being tied down due to a misplaced base, players experience true nomadic freedom with their own mobile house. They can effortlessly relocate, uncover breathtaking landscapes and transform any location into their personal sanctuary that embraces the joy of a life on the move.

■ Game Overview

How would you describe Bloomwalker in one sentence?

Bloomwalker is a cozy interactive experience that lets players embark on a cozy crafting journey aboard a traveling house while befriending Oddlings, cleansing a tainted land and creating their perfect sanctuary.

What is the core concept, and what kind of experience can players expect?

We aim to evoke the joy of healing and restoration in Bloomwalker. This isn’t a game of combat, but of caring and reviving a world in need. Players will purify a wounded land and build a family amidst solitude, experiencing heartfelt connections and emotional resonance throughout this moving journey.

What does the title Bloomwalker mean?

Bloomwalker translates to “one who walks while blooming flowers,” reflecting our vision of a world where your mobile house brings life back with every step. The title symbolizes the power of players to be a force of healing and renewal, transforming the world around them.

You describe the game as “emotional crafting”-how does that differ from traditional survival crafting games?

While traditional crafting games often revolve around survival, Bloomwalker offers a different experience, emphasizing “us and the world” through emotional crafting. Instead of the constant struggle to survive, we provide the joy of creating beauty, healing nature, and building meaningful relationships. With its rich themes of environment and emotion, we hope to invite more players to experience the unique and rewarding essence of the crafting genre.

■ Gameplay and Systems

What do players primarily do in the game?

There are four core activities in Bloomwalker:

  • Explore unknown lands aboard your moving house.
  • Purify polluted nature.
  • Craft and decorate using gathered resources.
  • Connect with the Oddlings as you prepare for your next journey.

You’ll also face challenges, including mysterious threats like the “Pelicanny.”

The game will support cooperative play, so players can explore and decorate their traveling home with friends.

Why did you decide to make the house move?

We encourage players to explore freely, without the fear of making mistakes. Unlike many crafting games where the base location is a stressful choice, we’ve removed that burden. Your house is a nomadic companion, allowing you to pack up and move to any landscape, transforming it into your next camp and home.

I wanted to control the house myself, but I couldn’t. Is it not controllable? Can I customize or upgrade it? What’s the “Magic Door”?

Yes! Full movement control is a key feature of the full game. The demo’s automated path was simply for showcasing the core appeal in a short time. And yes, you can unleash your creativity and decorate your house as you wish. We use a ‘Magic Door’ system to expand the interior space without changing the exterior, allowing you to design your own limitless and unique worlds.

The Oddlings are adorable. Who are they?

Oddlings are fairy-like companions you meet in the polluted world and, in turn, are your chosen family. We hope their presence brings the warmth of a “big, bustling family,” sharing daily life together. You’ll wake up, cook, play, and tuck each other in at night which is the kind of heartwarming routine that brings a smile to your face, and it’s all part of the game.

The black cat inside the house was memorable. Who is it?

Drawing inspiration from beloved fairy tales like Alice in Wonderland and The Wizard of Oz, the cat is a mysterious character who lives in the moving house and joins you on your quest to purify the world. It holds a secret… but we wouldn’t want to reveal too much! :)

The missions seemed quite structured—does that mean the game has low freedom for a crafting game?

The demo was designed to be a guided tour, highlighting the core features in a limited timeframe. In the full version, you’ll be able to explore freely, choosing your own objectives, solving environmental puzzles, and discovering hidden materials and secrets throughout the world.

■ Art, Story, and Atmosphere

The art style is stunning. What inspired this direction?

Our vision was to immerse players in a living, breathing world reminiscent of a stunning animated film. The art team’s primary focus was to ensure every visual element felt alive, employing gentle yet vibrant color contrasts to emphasize the powerful transition from decay to flourishing life.

What’s the overall story and worldbuilding like?

Humans and spirits once shared a flourishing world, until a meteor brought ruin. The impact zone became a source of corruption, spreading decay across the land. In response, individuals called the Bloomwalkers with the ability to heal the environment began to emerge. Their presence brings life back to blighted areas. Players will take on the role of a Bloomwalker, traveling the land in their Moving House of Restoration, seeking to undo the damage.

■ Development History

What games inspired Bloomwalker?

The crafting genre is filled with excellent games that have captivated players and sparked creativity. Bloomwalker, however, seeks to redefine the experience by introducing elements of heartfelt warmth, animation-inspired emotion, and a profound sense of harmony with the natural world. Instead of drawing inspiration from particular games, we chose to build upon the genre’s foundations while injecting our own unique emotional narrative.

Why choose the environment as a central theme?

Our philosophy is that games have the power to offer a warm and reflective perspective on life. Bloomwalker isn’t about delivering a complex message; instead, we aspire to evoke a subtle emotion in each player: the urge to protect the beauty that surrounds them. Our hope is that the game can encourage players to embrace a more positive outlook on the world.

■ Other Details

When will the game be released, and on what platforms?

We will share more details on the launch schedule through various channels.

It may take a while, but we believe it’s the time needed to fully realize the living, breathing world we envision.

The game made its debut at Gamescom, and we’re committed to making it a lasting, memorable experience.

Platforms? We’re preparing a broad launch. You’ll find Bloomwalker on Xbox, including Game Pass, and various platforms across console and PC.

Why did you debut at Gamescom? Are you targeting the European market?

Gamescom brings together some of the most passionate gamers in the world, making it the perfect place to share our new journey. We also believe that European players—many of whom deeply value environmental themes—will resonate strongly with our message of restoration and renewal.

What about language support?

The demo is currently in English, but the full game will support a wide range of languages, which is in line with what’s standard for console releases.

Watch the announcement trailer below.
